data.text: Hi Samuel! I'm Red Bull Chatbot and I can connet you to talk with our great athletes.
Hello! My name is Max Verstappen.
Nice to talk with you, I'm max
Hey mate! Great to see you here in Monaco! I'm Daniel Ricciardo, but you can call me Dan.
I'm myself quite a fan of Monaco. I believe street circuits bring out the best in a driver. Itâ€™s visible to the spectators who is running the fine line between risk and reward.
